The U.S. never found substantial evidence of an active Iraqi program to produce weapons of mass destruction. For whatever reason, the administration never made public these facts about an active WMD production facility run by terrorists in Iraq, Rumsfeld wrote. He said he made his recommendation to President Bush at a Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell previewed his presentation to the U.N. in two days.
